thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Weekend Stay
thread.title_full: Wonderful Weekend Stay - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: sballard
title: Wonderful Weekend Stay
text:
We celebrated our 5th anniversary at the Westin SFO on Saturday night (March 18). As we live in San Francisco it was a short ride from home but a lovely getaway. We enjoyed buffet breakfast on Sunday and treated ourselves to room service for dinner on Saturday night. The room was quiet and we had a lovely view of the San Francisco Bay. The bed truly was heavenly and the use of a spa robe was an added luxury. The pool and spa area were lovely. Eve Sheffield in Guest Services did an exceptional job in and made us feel special. I would highly recommend this hotel for travelers or for those looking for a little vacation closer to home
Room Tip: Request a room overlooking the San Francisco Bay See more room tips Green Features: The Westin SFO is an excellent, environmentally friendly hotel.
